A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I was very disappointed with the movie. 
Humor was to much ''marvel-like'' and put in the wrong place (what !? Luke throwing his light-saber after Rey give it to him ?)

The whole casino scene make no sense.

Lea should have died.

The way Snoke die is just plain stupid and his back story is never explained.

There was to much ''I want to sell this product''. So to much little Porgs scene to Disney can sell them to children's. The last scene in the movie\, where there is a little boy look like Disney wanted to tell child ''you can be a Jedi to''\, so it can sell a few plastic light-saber.

There wasn't a cool Jedi fight scene. Fight in this movie suck compare to the last one in The Force Awaken.
